extendedInfo.description: Let's enjoy the exciting sliding feelings with CONy!## Prologue ##-This application is available for OS over Android 2.2## Introduction ##SlideCONy is a casual arcade game with cute character whose name is CONy.Just try to make a perfect Goal into the dead center!You can enjoy various stages of desert, sea, ice road, magnetic field.And there are a lot of achievements you can challenge with your friends.## How to play ##1. Just pull and release the CONy character in Play circle. That's the start!2. Choose the character and level.3. Launch the character by pulling and release. You can adjust the power and direction. 4. Use the 'Goal in control' near at the goal.Goal in control : User can control the power and direction by finger slidings.5. Closer at the center, More score.6. You can clear the levels by avoiding the obstacles and arriving at the goal .## bug / Q&A ##-Email: appstore@broadcon.co.kr-Homepage: www.broadcon.net-Twitter: @broadcon-Facebook: www.facebook.com/broadconhc
